title: Leadership Competency Development: Beginner Mandarin Communication Using LLM-Based Educational Games

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners can explain the meanings and pronunciations of 30 basic Chinese characters with over 80% accuracy after interacting at least 10 times with an LLM tutor.
Learners can use daily life-related expressions (e.g., greetings, ordering, asking directions) with 70% accuracy in in-game simulation scenarios.
Learners can reduce grammatical error rates by over 15% in formative assessments after interacting with a tutor.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
